flowchart LR
    subgraph Slave["Slave APB (Input)"]
        S_PSEL["s_psel"]
        S_PADDR["s_paddr"]
        S_PENABLE["s_penable"]
        S_PWRITE["s_pwrite"]
        S_PWDATA["s_pwdata"]
    end

    subgraph apb_slave_stub["apb_slave_stub"]
        subgraph Logic["Stub Logic"]
            STUB["Accept all\nRespond OKAY"]
        end
    end

    subgraph Outputs["Outputs"]
        S_PRDATA["s_prdata = 0"]
        S_PREADY["s_pready = 1"]
        S_PSLVERR["s_pslverr = 0"]
    end

    S_PSEL --> Logic
    S_PADDR --> Logic
    S_PENABLE --> Logic
    S_PWRITE --> Logic
    S_PWDATA --> Logic
    Logic --> S_PRDATA
    Logic --> S_PREADY
    Logic --> S_PSLVERR
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
